synopsis.text: Japan's high school students are set to clash in the prestigious "God of High School" tournament, where the victor's wish will be granted, no matter the scale. Taekwondo prodigy Jin Mo-Ri eagerly accepts the invitation, relishing the opportunity to prove his self-proclaimed title as the strongest high schooler. Alongside fellow competitors Han Dae-Wi, a karate master, and Yu Mi-Ra, a skilled swordswoman, Mo-Ri embarks on a thrilling journey filled with formidable opponents and diverse fighting styles. As the ruthless battles unfold, the trio uncovers a hidden agenda beneath the tournament's surface, piquing the interest of Korean political candidate Park Mu-Jin. Prepare for a rollercoaster of action and intrigue as Mo-Ri, Dae-Wi, and Mi-Ra discover the true meaning of becoming the God of High School.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
